scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && rollup -c --environment BUILD:production && shx chmod 755 dist/*.js
scripts.build:exe: npm run build:dist && shx rm -rf mcp_client.exe && npx -y pkg ./dist/index.js -t node18-win-x64 -o mcp_client.exe
scripts.build:cross: npm run build:dist && shx rm -rf mcp_client-* && npx -y pkg ./dist/index.js -t node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64 -o mcp_client
